Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: laparoscopy \laparoscopy\ n. Laparotomy performed with a laparoscope. [WordNet 1.5]
laparoscopy n : laparotomy performed with a laparoscope that makes a small incision to examine the abdominal cavity (especially the ovaries and Fallopian tubes)
